Name: Dried Meadow Flower
Ingredients: 15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon slice wheel (& ideally a bouquet of edible flowers).
Garnish with lemon wheel (& preferably a bouquet of edible flowers).
Review: Floral elderflower and tequila with bittersweet gentian and refreshing lemon.
History: Created in August 2015 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Dried Meadow Flower contains 188 calories
